@mikemak_es @benschwarz @contentful @prismicio @Netlify @awscloud FWIW, If you use a static site generator, Contentful needn't be pricey since you'd be consuming its content only for builds, and not serving the world via its API. And you can get to AWS Lambda directly via Netlify Functions these days. But yeah. What you said. :)
